name: Snake4D
description:
Classic snake game in true 4D space. Eat, grow, don't hit walls or your own tail.

This is a proof of concept and this game is not supposed to be playable by a human being. Click "Demo" in menu to let AI play the game on its own. Click "Tutorial" if you want to get an idea how it can be played.

Controls: WASD for 3D turns left/right/up/down, QE for 4D-turns "redwise" and "bluewise", Space to flip left-right and red-blue axes.

Controls (2): P or Pause to pause the game and hide UI. Use mouse movement and wheel scroll to inspect the world at different angles. If no input is received from the mouse for a while, camera will be reset automatically.

More documentation and explanation...

WebGL 1 is required to run this game. If the game is too slow, make sure your browser supports hardware acceleration for WebGL 1.

Only "Demo" mode is supported on mobiles.
